an6.9:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these six subjects of recollection. What six? Recollection of the Buddha, recollection of the Dhamma, recollection of the Saá¹…gha, recollection of virtuous behavior, recollection of generosity, and recollection of the deities. These are the six subjects of recollection."[n.255] Elaborated just below atAN6.0and again atAN6.25.
